existing_features.title: In the first “LIFETIME GOALS” dashboard view (the view that shows the horizontal scrollable goal-category cards), display a small instructional text above the cards that reads exactly: "Organize your life: pick a goal (or add a new one) and assign it to the month you want to start crushing it!"

new_feature_requests.summary: Add small instructional text to the first 'LIFETIME GOALS' cards view: "Organize your life: pick a goal (or add a new one) and assign it to the month you want to start crushing it!"

projectName: Add instructional text to Lifetime Goals dashboard cards view
